item.title: Traders eye Bitcoin profit in short term
item.description:
Traders eye Bitcoin profit in short term

MORE than 80 percent of Bitcoin traders in China, the world's biggest Bitcoin trading market, pursue profit through short-term trading of the digital money, an industry report said yesterday. The price of Bitcoin, a form of digital currency created and held electronically, surged 50 percent in recent months to a two-year high in June due to booming Chinese investment and a cut in supply starting from today, industry officials said.

item.title: What to Expect When the Bitcoin Halving Happens - CoinDesk
item.description:
What to Expect When the Bitcoin Halving Happens - CoinDesk

It's an event that brings equal parts predictability and uncertainty. For close to a year, bitcoin miners and investors have been preparing for an event nicknamed ' the halving'. At approximately 18:00 UTC tomorrow, the subsidy the bitcoin network uses to compensate miners will drop from 25 BTC to 12.5 BTC, never to increase again.

item.title: Blockchain Social Platform Steemit Takes Advantage of Reddit's Heavy Censorship
item.description:
Blockchain Social Platform Steemit Takes Advantage of Reddit's Heavy Censorship

Since the early days of the internet, there has been a constant movement of people, from mailing boards to Facebook and Reddit. Eternal September keeps chasing out the best who are then followed by the rest with the process now repeating.

item.title: Bitcoin's Big Day (And Personality Problem)
item.description:
Bitcoin's Big Day (And Personality Problem)

We are just one day, one hour, and 40 something minutes away from Bitcoin's big day as I write these words. That's when the supply of coins that can be mined per block will be reduced by 50%, in a once every four years deflationary event called the "block halving".

item.title: Coinbase to Shutdown CAD Services to Canadian Customers
item.description:
Coinbase to Shutdown CAD Services to Canadian Customers

As of July 29, Coinbase will no longer be servicing its Canadian customers, informing them that they must change their existing CAD balances to Bitcoin or have it relocated to their bank account. The San Francisco-based company, who is a leading Bitcoin exchange, sent out an email to its customers informing them of the upcoming changes.

item.title: Blockchain Investment Off To A Slow Start In 2016
item.description:
Blockchain Investment Off To A Slow Start In 2016

The world of blockchain technology has seen its fair share of investments throughout the years. Just last year, in 2015, a new record for VC funding was noted. But the recent charts by WeUseCoins seems to indicate the blockchain investment bubble is about to burst.

item.title: North Carolina Shrugs as Lawmakers Define Bitcoin
item.description:
North Carolina Shrugs as Lawmakers Define Bitcoin

New cryptocurrency legislation was passed into law North Carolina by Governor Pat McCrory. Signed on July 6, the "Money Transmitters Act" defines virtual currencies as permissible investments, electronic and digital mediums, and digital records. some members of the cryptocurrency community, such as the Chamber of Digital Commerce.

item.title: Bitcoin Industry Seeking to Bridge Scaling Divide at July Meeting - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Industry Seeking to Bridge Scaling Divide at July Meeting - CoinDesk

Members of the bitcoin industry, including major miners and developers, are set to meet in California this month, sources say. Though details of the event are scarce, representatives from Blockstream, HaoBTC and F2Pool confirmed to CoinDesk they are planning to attend.

item.title: Renowned Futurists Merkle, Hanson on the Future of Government Using DAOs and Prediction Markets
item.description:
Renowned Futurists Merkle, Hanson on the Future of Government Using DAOs and Prediction Markets

In May, Bitcoin Magazine covered the spectacular launch of The DAO, a new kind of organization created and run using blockchain software rather than conventional corporate structures. The DAO ‒ an acronym for Distributed Autonomous Organization ‒ is similar to an open venture capital fund based on Ethereum smart contracts and rapidly became the world's largest crowdfunding to date.

item.title: Security Experts Warn Bitcoin Users After Recent Spate of Attacks
item.description:
Security Experts Warn Bitcoin Users After Recent Spate of Attacks

The gradual increase in popularity of Bitcoin over the last 12 months has been great for those who jumped on the bandwagon back in 2009. However, as with all industries that start to gain some coverage in the mainstream media, security has now become an issue for Bitcoin business owners and users.
